text:
@realDonaldTrump You don't brag about every state being under a disaster declaration. It's not something to celebrate. It's something to talk about sadly. That means you also need to cancel the tweet celebrating the USA having the most COVID19 deaths. 
(low-IQ & deplorable once again)
